alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 12:27PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Storey, southern Washoe and central Lyon Counties through 115 PM PDT... At 1226 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Virginia City, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reno, Virginia City, Sparks, Dayton, Lockwood, Wingfield Springs, Spanish Springs, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Golden Valley, Hidden Valley, Stead, Damonte Ranch, Pleasant Valley, Lemmon Valley, Reno-Tahoe International Airport, Nws Reno, Gold Hill, Spanish Springs Airport, Six Mile Canyon and Nv 341 At Washoe-Storey Co Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area; Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
